issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
With a remote Walrus, the OSG receives EucalyptusRemoteFault errors rather than WalrusExceptions and these are not handled properly by the OSG. This causes all sorts of metadata errors because delete operations rely on correct error responses 404s vs 204 vs 500.

{code}
2014-03-20 23:35:05 ERROR 000001018 WalrusProviderClient     | Error response from Walrus
com.eucalyptus.util.EucalyptusCloudException: com.eucalyptus.ws.EucalyptusRemoteFault: Action:ProblemAction Code:DeleteObjectType Id:RelatesTo Error: Get unique failed for BucketI
nfo using example: [BucketInfo ownerId=null userId=null bucketName=e0d4a492-e1f8-4bc2-a982-1fd69a587b47 creationDate=null globalRead=null globalWrite=null globalReadACP=null globa
lWriteACP=null bucketSize=null location=null hidden=null loggingEnabled=null targetBucket=null targetPrefix=null versioning=null grants=[] id=null version=null creationTimestamp=n
ull lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null]Get unique failed for BucketInfo using example: [BucketInfo ownerId=null userId=null bucketName=e0d4a492-e1f8-4bc2-a982-1fd69a587b47 cr
eationDate=null globalRead=null globalWrite=null globalReadACP=null globalWriteACP=null bucketSize=null location=null hidden=null loggingEnabled=null targetBucket=null targetPrefi

fields.summary: Error responses from remote Walrus not handled properly in OSG

comments.body:
Mine!


On Fri, Mar 21, 2014 at 1:16 AM, Zach Hill (JIRA) <

[~neil] [~zhill]

What are the steps to reproduce/verify?
Closing based on error responses properly being propagated through the OSG when using Walrus.
